title: Account hacked No one reached me in 2 months!!!!!
body: Look Riot its been 2 months going 3! I've done everything on my end with the damn account recovery!!! I put too much money in this game and I've been patient as long as i can and the ONLY thing i want is for a representative to cooperate with me to get my account(-snip-) back. What the hell is the hold up!?

replies.body: I've removed the account name in your post for privacy reasons.  If you have a ticket number, I can check the status for you!  Otherwise, be sure to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which is fielded directly to our account recovery team.  They'll be able to recover the account to you as long as you can verify ownership, as well as offer any reparations.  Good luck!
Hi Poracles, when i filled the ticket, I never received a Confirmation E-mail. Ive done 2 tickets since June 9th with a pop up from the support site telling me its been submitted.

Thanks for the follow up!  When you submitting the form, are you using an email address you currently have access to (not the one registered to the account)?  Double check your spam folders or trash in case the response might have been mis-labeled.

yes I am. i double checked to make sure that the E-mail was spelled properly on the second ticket and kept track of the spam folder. The seco nd ticket was a follow up to make sure i was suppose to receive a Confirmation Email but nothing was never sent to me from Riot Support.
How long ago did you submit the ticket?  Depending on the volume of tickets in queue, it may be a few moments.  Were you able to snag a ticket number upon submission?

There was no ticket number after submitting the ticket. it sent me back to support main page with a pop up at the top of the page with the message "Your ticket has been submitted" at the top. I had my E-mail open to be sure but nothing from support was sent to me to confirm submission or at least get a ticket . The first ticket was sent June 8th 2017 going into the 9th  and the second a weeks later on June 15, 2017. should i submit another and hope for the best?

I wasn't able to locate any tickets, so let's try another route!  Instead, hit us up via email directly at support@riotgames.com.  Make sure to double check your spam filters, but this way you can contact us directly without needing to use the ticketing center.  I hope that helps!
Thank you for helping Porocles. Ill try this route
